post.body: I guess she could replace Arnold some day btw, Lots of family in your area. Cardiff, PB, Coronado, Alpine, etc.
sugarjones I guess she could replace Arnold some day. btw, Lots of family in your area. Cardiff, PB, Coronado, Alpine, etc.
Perhaps Governor first.
We used to do a whole routine about it. Preacher married all of the women in the family. (Four - only one in the Biblical way.)
craving Cinnamon Toast tonight - Is she pregnant or what?
RE: Palin Wedding - Had to settle for a helicopter ;-) kind of up in the air about where to get married.
Lots of helicopter charters @evliving & I got married in a helicopter in the air above Sedona in June 2005 Wanted a plain wedding
Katie loves comments. :-) http://tinyurl.com/9eh55e
Cornbread will be on the menu for New Years and should be able to find by then. In meantime I used various beans in the soup
Will try to get to the Light Rail Grand Opening festivities tomorrow. Probably Tempe but ... I could probably be convinced otherwise.
Good night all. Early night for us. Carnival of the Recipes deadline is noon MST tomorrow. http://blogcarnival.com/bc/cprof_13.html
Trip to Secretary of State's office today was to finalize purchase/transfer of a couple of companies prior to year end. It's been a long day
